key.name: max-timer-value
key.description: Set maximum selectable time of the slider (in minutes). Use only values greater zero.

key.name: slider-value
key.description: Set slider position as percent of the maximum time. Must be in range 0 and 100.

key.name: root-mode-value
key.description: Set root mode on/off. In root mode powering off is done via 'pkexec' and 'shutdown' terminal command.

key.name: use-suspend-value
key.description: Use suspend instead of shutdown command.
